src:
Hasil Lengkap Liga Spanyol Pekan Ke-12: Barca Tumbang, Madrid Imbang
04 Nov 2019, 16:42 by Anggi Tiar


Hasil Lengkap Liga Spanyol Pekan Ke-12: Barca Tumbang, Madrid Imbang

KBRN, Jakarta : Pekan ke-12 La Liga atau Liga Spanyol 2019-2020 telah selesai dilangsungkan. Dua tim raksasa Spanyol yakni, Barcelona dan Real Madrid mendapatkan hasil kurang memuaskan di matchday kali ini. Seperti Barcelona, yang harus menelan kekalahan ketika bertandang ke markas klub papan tengah Levante. Bermain di Stadion Ciutat de Valencia, Sabtu (2/11/2019) El Barca kalah dengan 1-3 atas tuan rumah. Menariknya dalam laga ini terdapat pada tiga gol yang dicetak tuan rumah. Dimana, tiga gol tersebut tercipta dalam waktu tujuh menit di babak kedua. Sedangkan gol tunggal Barcelona tercipta lewat tendangan penalti di paruh pertama. Meski menelan kekalahan, Barcelona tetap berada di puncak klasemen sementara Liga Spanyol 2019-2020. El Barca mengoleksi 22 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Sejatinya, Real Madrid berplauag besar untuk menyalip Barca di puncak klasemen. Namun sayang, peluang itu dibuang percuma setelah mereka hanya mampu bermain imbang 1-1 kala menjamu Real Betis di Stadion Bernabeu. Kini Madrid pun, harus puas berada di bawah Barca dengan koleksi angka sama yakni 22 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Namun, Los Blancos harus puas berada di posisi kedua karena kalah selisih gol.Berikut Hasil Lengkap La Liga Pekan ke-12:Sabtu (02/11/19)Espanyol 1 - 2 ValenciaLevante 3 - 1 BarcelonaMinggu (03/11/19)Sevilla 1 - 1 Atletico MadridReal Madrid 0-0 Real BetisReal Valladolid 3 - 0 MallorcaVillarreal 0 - 0 Athletic ClubOsasuna 4 - 2 Deportivo AlavesSenin (04/11/19)Celta de Vigo 0 - 1 GetafeLeganes 1 - 2 EibarGranada 1 - 2 Real Sociedad
(Foto: istimewa)
text:
Complete results of the Spanish League Week 12: Barca Tumbang, Madrid Draw
Nov 04 2019, 16:42 by Anggi Tiar


Complete results of the Spanish League Week 12: Barca Tumbang, Madrid Draw

KBRN, Jakarta: Week 12 of the La Liga or Spanish League 2019-2020 has been completed. Two Spanish giants namely, Barcelona and Real Madrid get less satisfactory results on this matchday. Like Barcelona, who had to defeat when they travel to the headquarters of midfield club Levante. Playing at the Ciutat de Valencia Stadium on Saturday (11/02/2019) El Barca lost 1-3 to the hosts. Interestingly in this match there are three goals scored by the host. Where, these three goals were created within seven minutes in the second half. While Barcelona's single goal was created through a penalty kick in the first half. Despite swallowing defeat, Barcelona remain at the top of the Spanish league standings 2019-2020. El Barca collected 22 points from 11 matches. In fact, Real Madrid plays a great role to overtake Barca at the top of the table. But unfortunately, the opportunity was thrown away after they were only able to draw 1-1 when entertaining Real Betis at the Bernabeu Stadium. Now Madrid too, must be satisfied under Barca with the same collection of numbers, 22 points from 11 matches. However, Los Blancos had to settle for second place because they lost on goal difference. Following the results of La Liga Week 12: Saturday (02/11/19) Espanyol 1-2 Valencia Valencia 3-1 Barcelona Sunday (03/11/19) Sevilla 1 - 1 Atletico Madrid Real Madrid 0-0 Real Betis Real Valladolid 3 - 0 Mallorca Villarreal 0 - 0 Athletic Club Osasuna 4 - 2 Deportivo Alaves Monday (04/11/19) Celta de Vigo 0 - 1 GetafeLeganes 1 - 2 EibarGranada 1 - 2 Real Sociedad
(Photo: special)
